@ChrisFerdinandi @Netlify @digitalocean That's a luxury of #JAMstack sites. Super portable so you can move them around to wherever suits you best. Meanwhile if you're planning to keep WP for just purchase/auth'd content for now, Netlify's CDN can proxy any paths to external services. Just FYI. https://t.co/lSMgGGJBCE
